title: 08/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin breaks down the Lakers roster after they sign Carmelo Anthony and why they should no longer be considered an elite championship contender. He lays out the future of the 49ers and what they'll do at the quarterback position as rookie Trey Lance continues to impress in training camp. Plus, Hall of Famer Jimmy Johnson joins the show to share some memories from his career and what his relationship with Jerry Jones is like before his induction this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
